ygData.subject: Re: Serious Everquest question, please help
ygData.msgSnippet: If you die at levels below 5 you should resurrect with five days of food and water. If your corpse had nothing on it, it may have disappeared, but your own
ygData.messageBody:
If you die at levels below 5 you should resurrect with five days of
food and water. If your corpse had nothing on it, it may have
disappeared, but your own anwswer is most likely. You misplaced your
corpse. Dying at levels below five is set to be low-penalty (you lose
very little and get food and water when you come back) to make the
early learning a bit easier.

There are tools to find corpses, sold by merchants. However, it is
best to learn to die with finding your corpse in mind. Try to look
around at landmarks when death is clearly coming. Try to be near some
object you can find easily when you come back. And unless you don't
mind having to do this often, learn to fight in such a way as to
seldom die. Some gamers like to take the risks leading to frequent
deaths, but I prefer to hunt with care and die seldom. Seems more in
the spirit of the game to me.

Good hunting to you.

Barto Proudfoot

If --- In EverQuest@y..., "Minigamer" <rlebeau65@y...> wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> Forgive my ignorance but I am a newbie had a 4th level Druid in the
city of Elves and while out at the Orc Camp, with others, I got
killed by an Orc Centurian and when I returned to get my corpse,
nothing was there. It was not more than 4 minutes when I returned.
>
> Question: Is it possible for someone to Steal or Loot my corpse?
The book says no but I beg to differ.
> Is it possible that I had two corpses out there? Meaning, When I
went back with a dead body I died again? Which meant I found the
wrong corpse?
>
> And to add one last question, "what do I do now? seeing as I have
no food, no money, no nothing?" Do I beg or do I start another char?
> This game is totally fun but with the fact of trying to learn which
way to go all the time and dying, it is starting to get to me,
> I don't want to give up just yet and I turned to this board since
the Chat from the game options was USELESS.
>
> Please help and Thanks in advance
>
> Rob
